page.title: 17Ecology -Ecoleg.
page.content: Because we live in a rural area the nature of the land offers much wild life.The village is situated at the foot of the hills between the sea and the mountains.Many flowers of all kinds are to be seen at different times of the year.Various flowers of the sea shore,flowers along paths and roadsides, in fields and inthe woods. They are threatened today by the use man makes of different types of chemicals and sprays. Roadsides are not cut but sprayed and in windy weather it is not possible to know how this affects many of the flowers that grow.Listed below are some of the flowers. Bindweed. Campion. Cuckoopint. Bluebell. Celandine. Dandelion. Bramble. Clover. Daisy. Broom. Cotton grass.Dogrose. Buttercup.Crowfoot. Foxgloves.
